overview: A superstitious family gets thrown for a loop when Iccha Shankar brings home a con man masquerading as a mahatma, who tricks the whole house into carrying out his mischievous plans. It's not long before Shankar's perceptive son and son-in-law begin to smell a phony in this satirical farce by Gujurati humorist Tarak Mmehta. The film stars Mukesh Rawal, Santu Rajda, Chirag Acharya, Vimal Upadhyay, Bharat Shroff, Jeetu Mehta and Anuradha Kaabhar.
title: Ek Murakh Ne Evi Tev
